title: umaiyOr bhAganE
sahitya:
umaiyOr bhAganE tiruvaruL puri ulaga nAthanE paramashivanE


anupallavi

  kamala pAdam nAn maravEn kAmanai venravanE
 karuNAkaranE shankaranE  mangaLakaranE


caraNam    mAdhar uRavAi maruvukAdal viLaiyADAmal mAyai vashamAi samsAra valaiyil 
 vIzhndu vADAmal bOdham izhandu punitan unadu pugazhin vErupADAmal puNNiya yOgiyar pOl  uyar turavu neriyil urudi peravE aru paghaiyaravE parindu kanindu
